creator: jerome_louvel@yahoo.fr
text:
I have a web app with the following configuration:

   <mime-mapping>
       <extension>xhtml</extension>
       <mime-type>application/xhtml+xml</mime-type>
   </mime-mapping>

   <welcome-file-list>
       <welcome-file>index.xhtml</welcome-file>
   </welcome-file-list>

When I request http://myserver/index.xhtml I receive the XHTML web page
normally. However, if I request http://myserver/ I receive the file without the
correct mime-type set, which opens an Open with/Save as... dialog in the browser.

creator: remm@apache.org
text:
This works fine (just tested). The extension declaration will also override
correctly the one which is in conf/web.xml.
